question.title: Bind test dependency in custom library but exclude from main jar in spring boot application
question.body:
I have been reading all about it but did not find any thing. I am trying to make a custom library. I also want to put all test dependencies in it. i can do it by removing test scope but main jar where i am using this library is also binding test library in it lib folder of jar and that's making it fatter.

Is it possible to exclude test dependencies from main jar.

i tried using maven-surefire-plugin in library module and put test scope but that did not work. if it is not possible then is there any issue with main fat jar apart from size.

spring boot 3.2.2
